      • EmergencyReportAction

        public EmergencyReportAction(DAOFactory factory,
                     long loggedInMID,
                     java.lang.String pidString)
                      throws iTrustException
        The super class handles validating the pid Logs viewing of the report
        ??:
        factory - The DAOFactory used in creating the DAOs for this action.
        loggedInMID - The MID of the user who is looking at the emergency report.
        pidString - The ID of the patient whose report is being generated.
        ??:
        iTrustException
